C

calculateArea() - Method in class ComplexShape
An abstract method that enforces the calculation of the shape's area.
calculateArea() - Method in class Ellipse
This method calculates the area of the ellipse using the two radii.

This method calculates the area of the parallelogram using the base and height.
calculateArea() - Method in class Rectangle
This method calculates the area of the rectangle using the length and width.

calculateArea() - Method in class Trapezoid
This method calculates the area of the trapezoid using the two bases and the height.

This method calculates the area of the triangle using the base and height.

GeometryDrawingProgram - Class in <Unnamed>
[GeometryDrawingProgram.java] The program allows the user to add shapes, remove shapes, translate shapes and save and load files on to a cartesian plane.
